column1: Narrator : It's a small island covered in grassy fields.
Narrator : A sign on the beach reads: « Stuff, things & baubles »

column13: OtherSpeak : You mongrel, I knew it!

column7: Choice : Give me everything you have! (attack)
column10: Choice : Tell me about the ocean !

column3: OtherSpeak : Only sailors from the DIRECTIONTOFORMULA are interested
column4: OtherSpeak : Nope, first time I hear about it, sorry.
column8: OtherSpeak : Nowadays people rarely cross the ocean
column11: OtherSpeak : I’d prefer we talk business only

column8: OtherSpeak : to buy things I find at the bottom of it.
column13: PlayerSpeak : The vendor’s dead on the floor!

column14: PlayerSpeak : I don’t know what I expected, really.
